title: Van Aert, Evenepoel dismiss Belgium’s doubters ahead of road worlds: ‘We’re professional enough to work together’
content:
Van Aert, Evenepoel, Philipsen pledge to race 'all for one' after concerns over internal clashes rattle across Belgian nation.

Read the full article at Van Aert, Evenepoel dismiss Belgium’s doubters ahead of road worlds: ‘We’re professional enough to work together’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
